Reviews.Title: “Stay only if desperate...”
Reviews.Author: SneakyTravelKitty
Reviews.Content: probably worst hotel ive stayed location beat 5 minute walk centraal train station shops coffee shops red light district stayed march 31st april 2nd friend believe paid 200 nights dungeon stench weed nonsmoking hotel tiny dirty dark beds bathroom window view hotel wall 56 hotel windows privacy silence unheard close blinds pair earplugs planning rest noisy day night people throw stuff windows pigeons elevator drag suitcase tiny staircases free wifi gotta credit blonde front desk guy helpful cheerful dealing crap guess hes pay stay

Reviews.Title: “pay extra for elswhere”
Reviews.Author: luvlylynzi
Reviews.Content: stayed 2 nights scruffy basic ideal location near train station grass hopper stairs amsterdam steep card machine didnt cash machine pay reservation staff wouldnt changed soaked own bathroom shower hot water

Reviews.Title: “Great location but more hostel then hotel quality”

Reviews.Content: admit arrived impressed hotel definately description hostel decor awful reception waiting train station reception hotel reception lift stairs steep narrow amentities example barrestaurant breakfast service lugging heavy suitcase stairs exercise staff extremely helpful helpful day pretty forgotten initial disappointment nice day minded bags checked enjoy day holiday lugging heavy suitcases location unbeatable centre amsterdam walking distance walking distance easily accessible hop onhop city bus tour windows easy fall lot people coffee shops amsterdam lean window air etc easily fall bar window

Reviews.Title: “Bargain room - great location - Be Careful of the stairs!”
Reviews.Author: NTF07
Reviews.Content: cheap youd expect cheap 6 2nd floor bathroom bit cramped 2 nights literally 100 yards grass hopper staff lovely bags holding late flight careful stairs steep youve dangerous

Reviews.Title: “perfect spot,clean and lovely”
Reviews.Author: simpletravelerka
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel ben twice recently 34 perfect reccomend probably people backpackers luxury stay perfect location perfect price spotless bathroom clean roomalthough basic thats reflected price comfy noisy ear plugs light stairs steep expect type buildings lovely staff please read hotel description site genuine fussy smoking policy noise breakfast stay familychildren id advise leave luggage check help hope stay time visit amsterdam absolutely love thank staff hospitality

Reviews.Title: “Mind the stairs..........”
Reviews.Author: frazzamacca
Reviews.Content: looking reasonably priced hotel middle amsterdam arent bothered frills cant beat ben 5 minutes walk station edge red light district 50 yds grasshopper bar drink stairs precarious fourth floor fourty fourth due amount amstel drunk lads weekend world racing racetrack fancy wouldnt wife location fantastic staff clean tidy probably lower floor cash reason wouldnt accept credit card means payment deposit booking check book

Reviews.Content: friends 21st birthday 8 maintance girls managed stay time nicest world basic ok weekend spend little time anyway alot stairs abit maze 2 6 people people nice moan loud ok location 2min walk cafes 5mins maybe 10mins max heart red light food super expensive bring munchies sweets stuff isnt pay id defo extra bonus smoke else allows

Reviews.Title: “Hotel okay, nothing exciting but you pay what you get”

Reviews.Content: hotel location near pubs cafes restaurants shops attactions approx 510 min walk central station basic clean extent bit damp ceiling smelt bit musty decor poor main complaint walls thin hear door 5 lads pot whatever else doing kung foo kicks night funny hours situated hotel onto main street noisy night ok staying hours night sleep earlier flight noise loud stayed 1star hotel cheap pay dont hotel

Reviews.Title: “Central location...basic but clean,”

Reviews.Content: stayed fairly 3 beds crammed little else thats price bang centre parrot welcome check 10 walk central station taxi rank minute walk five minute walk red light district countless coffeeshops word caution church bells pretty loud morning bearable actually hotel 10am morning
